title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 December 2014 - XWiki
content:
<Lyes> has joined #xwiki

00:25 <lucaa> has quit

09:24 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <Emenems> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
09:55 <vmassol> good morning  
09:56 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <vmassol> FYI I'm done with the email refactoring, just rebuilding everything to do a manual test to be sure it's all ok  
09:57 <vmassol> (since I touched quite a lot of modules)  
10:06 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <vmassol> FYI just found 400 JIRA emails in my gmail spam folder…. :(  
10:06 <vmassol> (again)-  
10:24 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:29 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <vmassol> grrrr I lost some wiki page content by rebuilding (had forgotten to export it) :( recreting....  
10:55 <mosulica> has joined #xwiki  
10:59 <tmortagne> mflorea: Jenkins is saying that the cause of failing test in xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium, xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg and xwiki-enterprise-test-ldap is one commit from you but no idea which one since the git id it's giving does not exist  
10:59 <tmortagne> most of them seems to have issue determining if they are logged in or to actually login  
11:00 <tmortagne> maybe it remind you of something  
11:00 <mflorea> yep  
11:00 <mflorea> the change in the menu  
11:00 <tmortagne> was around Dec 10  
11:00 <tmortagne> probably XWIKI-11517  
11:00 <mflorea> I must have forgotten to update a selector  
11:00 <mflorea> I will look into it  
11:00 <mflorea> (finishing something first)  
11:01 <tmortagne> xwiki-enterprise-test-ldap is based on xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium so it's probably the same  
11:01 <mflorea> yes  
11:01 <mflorea> to see if the user is logged in the test looks at the top level menu, for the user menu and the HTML structure has changed a bit  
11:02 <mflorea> I updated the page objects that open the top level menus  
11:02 <mflorea> I must update this part too  
11:08 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
11:11 <vmassol> found a bug in my email refactoring, going to take a bit longer...  
13:20 <woshilap1n> has joined #xwiki

15:17 <Lyes1> has joined #xwiki

16:25 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
16:25 <\_cjd> has quit  
16:25 <Denis> has quit  
16:36 <alex\_xwiki> has joined #xwiki  
16:36 <alex\_xwiki> hello  
16:44 <alex\_xwiki> I would like to customize the table of contents for pdf exports  
16:45 <alex\_xwiki> I succed to change cover and main content template in PDF exports, but I didn't found something about the TOC  
16:45 <alex\_xwiki> succeed\*  
16:47 <vmassol> alex\_xwiki: you can check pdf.vm and follow the code maybe?  
16:48 <vmassol> just checked  
16:48 <vmassol> it calls pdftoc.vm  
16:48 <vmassol> so that's what you need to override/modify  
16:49 <vmassol> actually no  
16:49 <vmassol> the code is in pdfhtmlheader.vm  
16:52 <alex\_xwiki> Thanks, I found the CSS classname "pdftoc", i'll try to override it  
17:00 <alex\_xwiki> I added a .pdftoc{} into my pdf.css and it doesn't seem to work :(  
17:01 <alex\_xwiki> in the pdftoc.vm, there is only the title of the section ! it's weird  
17:05 <Enygma`> vmassol: could you please have a look at http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-watchlist-test-tests/567/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.watchlist.test.ui/WatchThisPageAndWholeSpaceTest/testWatchThisPageAndWholeSpace/ ?  
17:05 <vmassol> Enygma`: yep  
17:05 <Enygma`> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-watchlist-test-tests/567/console at 16:08:04.130  
17:06 <vmassol> missing some dependency apparently  
17:06 <Enygma`>  Caused by: org.xwiki.component.manager.ComponentLookupException: Can't find descriptor for the component [role = [interface org.xwiki.mail.MailSenderConfiguration] hint = [default]]  
17:06 <Enygma`> yep, probably  
17:06 <Enygma`> or components.txt or something  
17:06 <vmassol> no that's ok  
17:37 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:51 <alex\_xwiki> has quit  
17:53 <Lyes1> has quit  
18:07 <woshilap1n> has quit  
18:09 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:23 <Enygma`> vmassol: from the title of these tests, I assume this is still related to the mail module http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/416/  
18:24 <vmassol> maybe, not sure  
18:24 <vmassol> not directly at least  
18:26 <mflorea> vmassol: can I assert the log message in a unit test if the logger object is created statically with LoggerFactory.getLogger? I guess not but I wanted to be sure  
18:26 <vmassol> yes you can mflorea  
18:26 <vmassol> check LogRule  
18:27 <mflorea> ok, thanks  
18:27 <vmassol> it modifies dynamically the appenders  
18:27 <mflorea> cool  
18:27 <mflorea> let's try  
18:27 <vmassol> s/un memory/in memory  
18:27 <vmassol> but you can use directly the LogRule rule  
18:32 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:34 <evalica> has quit  
18:53 <mflorea> vmassol: worked nicely, thanks again  
18:53 <vmassol> cool
